Row.Text: Can embark and move over Oceans immediately. +1 Sight, +1 [ICON_MOVES] Movement, and extra defense when embarked. +10% [ICON_STRENGTH] Combat Strength bonus if within 3 tiles of a Moai.

Ancient Era unit that strikes fear into nearby enemies making them less effective in combat. Only Polynesia may build it. It is stronger than the Warrior it replaces, and comes with the amphibious promotion, allowing it to attack efficiently from the sea or across a river.

[COLOR_WARNING_TEXT](DE_DE text) [ENDCOLOR]Ancient Era unit that strikes fear into nearby enemies making them less effective in combat. Only Polynesia may build it. It is stronger than the Warrior it replaces, and comes with the amphibious promotion, allowing it to attack efficiently from the sea or across a river.

It is stronger than the Warrior it replaces, and comes with the amphibious promotion, allowing it to attack efficiently from the sea or across a river.

[COLOR_WARNING_TEXT](RU_RU text) [ENDCOLOR]Ancient Era unit that strikes fear into nearby enemies making them less effective in combat. Only Polynesia may build it. It is stronger than the Warrior it replaces, and comes with the amphibious promotion, allowing it to attack efficiently from the sea or across a river.

The Maori Warrior is similar to a Great General; however instead of increasing the strength of friendly units, it decreases the strength of adjacent enemy units. It also receives a promotion which eliminates combat penalty for attacking from the sea or over a river. Build plenty of these units early for their promotions stay with them as they are upgraded.

[COLOR_WARNING_TEXT](DE_DE text) [ENDCOLOR]The Maori Warrior is similar to a Great General; however instead of increasing the strength of friendly units, it decreases the strength of adjacent enemy units. It also receives a promotion which eliminates combat penalty for attacking from the sea or over a river. Build plenty of these units early for their promotions stay with them as they are upgraded.

Adds a Moai (+1 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture) to the tile. Create a line of Moai along the coast for additional culture. Also provides +1 [ICON_GOLD] Gold after Economics is researched.

[COLOR_WARNING_TEXT](DE_DE text) [ENDCOLOR]Adds a Moai (+1 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture) to the tile. Create a line of Moai along the coast for additional culture. Also provides +1 [ICON_GOLD] Gold after Economics is researched.

It will permit the tile to generate [ICON_CULTURE] Culture (and [ICON_GOLD] after Economics is researched).
[COLOR_WARNING_TEXT](DE_DE text) [ENDCOLOR]It will permit the tile to generate [ICON_CULTURE] Culture (and [ICON_GOLD] after Economics is researched).
[COLOR_WARNING_TEXT](PL_PL text) [ENDCOLOR]It will permit the tile to generate [ICON_CULTURE] Culture (and [ICON_GOLD] after Economics is researched).
[COLOR_WARNING_TEXT](RU_RU text) [ENDCOLOR]It will permit the tile to generate [ICON_CULTURE] Culture (and [ICON_GOLD] after Economics is researched).

Moai can only be built on the coast. If built next to another Moai, it provides additional [ICON_CULTURE] Culture. After the Economics technology is researched it also provides extra [ICON_GOLD] Gold.
